nodes.bodyText: Maybe better to set it to true by default (most users are using the internal service). It will make the default installation more secured.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -42,3 +42,7 @@ urlChecker.UserAgent=GeoNetwork Link Checker
 
 map.bbox.background.service=https://ows.terrestris.de/osm/service?SERVICE=WMS&REQUEST=GetMap&VERSION=1.1.0&LAYERS=OSM-WMS&STYLES=default&SRS={srs}&BBOX={minx},{miny},{maxx},{maxy}&WIDTH={width}&HEIGHT={height}&FORMAT=image/png
 
+# If false, the services to draw map extents (region.getmap and {metadatauuid}/extents.png) accept urls for
+# map services to provide the background layers. Otherwise the only allowed options are from the settings configuration
+# or a named bg layer from regionGetMapBackgroundLayers
+metadata.extentApi.disableFullUrlBackgroundMapServices=false
